member.name: T:AttributeRouting.Web.Http.WebHost.Framework.HttpWebAttributeRoute
member.summary: Route to use for Web API web-hosted routes.
member.remarks: This class is intended to mimic the functionality of System.Web.Http.WebHost.Routing.HttpWebRoute, which is internal to the framework. Ideally, both HttpWebRoute and HostedHttpRoute would be public so I could simply use them and not recreate the wheel.

member.name: F:AttributeRouting.Web.Http.WebHost.Framework.HttpWebAttributeRoute.HttpRouteKey
member.summary: Key used to signify that a route URL generation request should include HTTP routes (e.g. Web API). If this key is not specified then no HTTP routes will match.

member.name: M:AttributeRouting.Web.Http.WebHost.Framework.HttpWebAttributeRoute.#ctor(System.String,System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary,System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary,System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary,AttributeRouting.Web.Http.WebHost.HttpWebAttributeRoutingConfiguration)
member.summary: Route used by the AttributeRouting framework in web projects.

member.name: M:AttributeRouting.Web.Http.WebHost.HttpWebAttributeRoutingConfiguration.ScanAssemblyOf``1
member.summary: Scans the assembly of the specified controller for routes to register.
member.typeparam: The type of the controller used to specify the assembly

member.name: M:AttributeRouting.Web.Http.WebHost.HttpWebAttributeRoutingConfiguration.AddRoutesFromController``1
member.summary: Adds all the routes for the specified controller type to the end of the route collection.

member.name: M:AttributeRouting.Web.Http.WebHost.HttpWebAttributeRoutingConfiguration.AddRoutesFromControllersOfType``1
member.summary: Adds all the routes for all the controllers that derive from the specified controller to the end of the route collection.

member.name: M:AttributeRouting.Web.Http.WebHost.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapHttpAttributeRoutes(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection)
member.summary: Scans the calling assembly for all routes defined with AttributeRouting attributes, using the default conventions.

member.name: M:AttributeRouting.Web.Http.WebHost.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapHttpAttributeRoutes(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.Action{AttributeRouting.Web.Http.WebHost.HttpWebAttributeRoutingConfiguration})
member.summary: Scans the specified assemblies for all routes defined with AttributeRouting attributes, and applies configuration options against the routes found.
member.param: The initialization action that builds the configuration object

member.name: M:AttributeRouting.Web.Http.WebHost.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapHttpAttributeRoutes(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,AttributeRouting.Web.Http.WebHost.HttpWebAttributeRoutingConfiguration)
member.summary: Scans the specified assemblies for all routes defined with AttributeRouting attributes, and applies configuration options against the routes found.

member.name: T:AttributeRouting.Web.Http.WebHost.Routing.HttpMethodHelper
member.summary: Various helper methods for the static members of .

member.name: M:AttributeRouting.Web.Http.WebHost.Routing.HttpMethodHelper.GetHttpMethod(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the static instance for any given HTTP method name.
member.returns: An existing static or a new instance if the method was not found.

member.name: T:AttributeRouting.Web.Http.WebHost.Routing.RouteBypassingHandler
member.summary: see Issue #90 - https://github.com/mccalltd/AttributeRouting/issues/90 Workaround for a bug in System.Web.Http.Dispatcher.HttpRoutingDispatcher. Thanks HongMei Ge!
